alert.note: Alert for Sabine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 1:29AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN DE SOTO... SOUTHWESTERN NATCHITOCHES AND SABINE PARISHES...EASTERN SHELBY AND CENTRAL SABINE COUNTIES THROUGH 200 AM CDT... At 128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Converse to near Mayflower. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, Zwolle, Hemphill, Converse, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Florien, Huxley, Noble, Fisher, Robeline, Fairmount, Mount Carmel, Belmont, Negreet, Yellowpine, Toledo Bend Reservoir North, Columbus, and Marthaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
